title: Orymbek Zhautykov
summary: Orymbek Akhmetbekovich Zhautykov (1 May 1911 â€“ 15 May 1989) was a Kazakh mathematician.[1] His mathematical work focussed on stability theory of motion, equations which govern physics and infinite systems of differential equations.[2] Throughout his life he published many different pieces of work including research papers, textbooks and biographies of mathematicians on their birth/death anniversaries.[1]
